glsa.title: Nautilus: Security bypass
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Nautilus may allow attackers to escape the sandbox.

background.p: Default file manager for the GNOME desktop

description.p: A vulnerability was discovered in Nautilus which allows an attacker to escape the sandbox.

impact.p: A local attacker could possibly bypass sandbox protection.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Nautilus users should upgrade to the latest version:
